stem: Given question: Where does someone obtain a frying pan? and answer: department store, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Department stores usually sell kitchen equipments, and a frying pan is a kitchen equipment.
100_to_150_words: A department store is a great place to obtain a frying pan because they often have a wide selection of various types and sizes of frying pans available. Department stores typically carry a variety of products from different brands and manufacturers. This allows shoppers to compare prices and features between different frying pans, so they can select the one that best meets their needs. Additionally, department stores often offer discounts and promotions on their products, allowing shoppers to purchase a frying pan at a more affordable price. Finally, department stores usually have knowledgeable staff members who can answer any questions shoppers may have about the frying pans they are looking to buy.
